about_the_game:
All in your head is a single-player first-person horror game. You take on the role of a left-behind young man who has to survive in a cabin that was meant to be a destination party with his co-workers & friends. The cabin is located in a beautiful & secluded hill of the country-side. But seclusion can also mean lack of access to resources & unchartered territories.

In this first-person horror adventure, you walk through the cabin and surrounding areas, trying to uncover the mystery of what went wrong and why you are alone in the cabin now. However, you need to be careful. As uncovering the mystery also uncovers the horrors lying underneath the surface.

Explore the cabin, investigate the items around and deduce the reason for the unfortunate event that has taken place. Meanwhile, you might need to finish what you and your friends came here to do, all alone. Try to stay in the light but if need be, use your phone as your flashlight.



Use your phone as your flashlight, explore the area and uncover the mystery of what happened.. But make sure you have the tools to survive the night!

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes horror themed content with loud noises, psychological fear and fights without blood.

short_description: All in your head is a single-player first-person horror game. You find yourself in a cabin alone and your goal is to finish what you and your friends came here to do, but alone. Beware of Miley, a girl who roams the areas, because all you have is your phone's light.
